page.title: 09Military Museum Beverley
page.content: The Museum contains many kinds of Military transport. It opened on April 11th. 1984. Over 100,000 people have visited the museum in one year. It opens every day except Christmas day. Admission is Â£1.00 for adults and 50p. for children. An attraction of the museum is that visitors can explore some of the vehicles. One vehicle worth seeing is the prototype fold-up car. It can be folded up, parachuted down from an aeroplane and assembled in one minute. The facilities they offer are very good. School parties are welcomed and guides are available to take you round. There is a{cookhouse} and a{bar.}It is the only museum of military transport in the North of England.
